devicePage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: llwu_me_wume0
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables this peripheral to wakeup the processor

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables this peripheral to wakeup the processor

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables this peripheral to wakeup the processor

binaryOption.name: llwu_me_wume7

devicePage.template: \t// Module wake ups \tstatic constexpr uint8_t me = \t LLWU_ME_WUME0($(llwu_me_wume0:0)) | // LPTMR \t LLWU_ME_WUME1($(llwu_me_wume1:0)) | // CMP0 \t LLWU_ME_WUME2($(llwu_me_wume2:0)) | // CMP1 \t LLWU_ME_WUME3($(llwu_me_wume3:0)) | // CMP2/3 (if present) \t LLWU_ME_WUME4($(llwu_me_wume4:0)) | // TSI0 (if present) \t LLWU_ME_WUME5($(llwu_me_wume5:0)) | // RTC Alarm \t LLWU_ME_WUME6($(llwu_me_wume6:0)) | // \t LLWU_ME_WUME7($(llwu_me_wume7:0)); // RTC Seconds\n\n

choiceOption.name: llwu_filt1_filte
choiceOption.toolTip: Controls the digital filter options for the external pin detect.

intOption.name: llwu_filt1_filtsel
intOption.toolTip: Selects 1 of the external signals to be muxed into the filter

devicePage.template: \t// Pin Filter 1 register \tstatic constexpr uint8_t filt1 = \t LLWU_FILT_FILTE($(llwu_filt1_filte)) | // Digital Filter On External Pin \t LLWU_FILT_FILTSEL($(llwu_filt1_filtsel)); // Filter Pin Select\n\n
